file_content.text: Well done, my friends. We now have access to the Empire's communications. Do you read me?
Outstanding. You've given us access to the Empire's communications. Are you there, my friend?
Our data slicers are quietly shutting down the Empire's security grid. The enemy's in for an unpleasant surprise.
The time for subtlety is almost over. Make your way carefully to the fortress... but once you arrive, strike quickly and hard.
There is no pleasant way to make a frontal assault on an Imperial fortress.
I won't have any choice.
Normally, I'd advise you to minimize the casualties, but our objective is too important.
I'd rather not hurt anyone I don't have to. Is there a way to enter the fortress without fighting?
I prefer less violent methods.
I'm sorry we have to be the aggressors here, but we have no choice.
This isn't the first time I've crashed one of the Empire's parties.
I plan to.
You may find this particular celebration more intense than normal.
Making a big entrance is my specialty, little guy. Relax and enjoy the show.
I always do.
Your confidence inspires many feelings, young one. Let's hope the enemy is more frightened than amused.
How fast will those ships in orbit respond once they hear what's happening at the fortress?
What about the Imperial fleet?
The sentry ships aren't prepared for a ground invasion. They shouldn't be a factor.
This would be easier if you weren't jabbering at me all the time. You're the worst backseat driver I've ever met.
You talk too much.
Ha. Normally, people are stepping on my toes. Point taken.
I'm sending coordinates to the fortress. The Gree computer is amazingly compact. You'll have no trouble carrying it out.
I'll keep quiet from here on, unless it's an emergency. Oteg out....
